Package thorwin.math.geo

Provides a variety of geometry related classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Transform2D
    Interface to objects that can transforms 2D coordinates.
    Transform3D
    Interface to objects that can transform 3D coordinates.
    Volume
    Interface to 3-dimensional shapes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AABB
    An axis aligned box.
    AxisAngle
    Representation of a rotation using an axis and angle.
    BezierCurve3D
    A cubic Bézier curve in 3D space.
    Cuboid3D
    Cuboid in 3-dimensional space.
    Ecef
    Earth-Centered-Earth-Fixed coordinate.
    Enu
    East, North, Up coordinate system.
    Euler
    Rotation around three axis.
    Frustrum3D
    Frustrum
    Geodetic
    Geodetic coordinate on WGS 84 geodetic datum.
    GeodeticBounds
    Bounds of a rectangular area in geodetic coordinates (may multiply anti-meridian by defining the eastern border to the left of the western border).
    GreatCircleDistance
    Class that holds all results from a great-circle distance calculation on a sphere/spheroid.
    Line2D
    A line in 2-dimensional space.
    Line3D
    A line in 3-dimensional space
    Octree<D extends Volume>
    A loose Octree implementation of 3D bounding boxes.
    Plane3D
    A plane in 3-dimensional space
    Polygon2D
    A closed polygon in 2-dimensional space
    Quaternion
    Quaternion
    Ray3D
    A ray consists of an origin and a direction.
    Rectangle2D
    Axis aligned rectangle in 2-dimensional space.
    Rectangle3D
    2-dimensional rectangle in 3-dimensional space.
    Segment2D
    A line segment between two points in 2-dimensional space.
    Segment3D
    Line segment between two points in 3-dimensional space.
    Sphere3D
    Sphere
    Spheroid3D
    Spheroid or ellipsoid of revolution.
    Triangle2D
    Triangle in 2-dimensional space
    Triangle3D
    Triangle in 3-dimensional space
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Intersection
    Enumeration for intersection operations to indicate if an object is inside, outside or partially intersects a volume.

Package thorwin.math.geo Description

Provides a variety of geometry related classes.

In particular this package provides classes for representing 2- and 3-dimensional primitives, such as lines, line-segments, cuboids, spheres, polygons, triangles and planes.

Utility classes for processing 3-dimensional data is provided in the form of the AABB (Axis-Aligned-Bounding-Box) and Octree classes.

Three implementations for 3-dimensional rotations are available: Euler, axis/angle and Quaternions.

Real-world coordinate systems are supported: Geodetic, Ecef (Earth-Centered-Earth-Fixed) and Enu (East-North-Up).
